players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana and found her to be the mafia. Alice was killed last night, confirming her role. Let's vote to eliminate her."
Diana: remained silent.
Charlie: "Bob, you said Alice was killed last night, but she was found dead. That contradicts your claim. Also you claimed to investigate Diana as mafia, but you are the only suspect. Vote for Bob."
Diana: "Bob, you claimed to investigate me but gave no proof. I suspect you are lying. Charlie, you are the only other villager, so you must be innocent. Vote for Bob."
Charlie: "Bob's claim about Alice being killed last night is false. He must be mafia. Vote Bob."
You: "I investigated Diana, found her mafia. Alice was killed last night, confirming her role. Charlie, you are innocent. Vote Diana."

players.name: Diana

You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.

You: "Bob, you claimed to investigate me but gave no proof. I suspect you are lying. Charlie, you are the only other villager, so you must be innocent. Vote for Bob."
